original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 323.60/90 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 323.60/90 to the US dollar on Thursday, from 324.00/25 on the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 13.85/95 percent from 13.75/83 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted stable at 14.05/20 percent.
On the CSE, the ASPI opened up 0.50 percent at 10,658; and the S&P SL20 up 0.60 percent at 3,067.(Colombo/Dec28/2023)
